channel.title: Comments on: Eureka! Pullquotes With Ending Quotes

item.title: By: Christian Watson
item.dc:creator: Christian Watson
item.description: Glad you found my examples useful! If only there was a way to do pull-quotes with beginning and ending quotes that validated and could handle multiple paragraphs - that would make me a happy man.
item.content:encoded: Glad you found my examples useful! If only there was a way to do pull-quotes with beginning and ending quotes that validated and could handle multiple paragraphs – that would make me a happy man.
